tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Friendly doctor and friendly staffs with quick response,  all cardio and general medicine can be recommended to visit Dr.Praveen Kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi everyone,I have a saviour cardiac attack in Aug  2020 pandemic time ,one of my close friend and he is a  Doctor suggested me to go and meet Dr.Praveen sir at Vikram Hospital and follow what ever he suggests blindly And  did the same .By god's grace after 2D Echo and Angiogram and necessary test ,happy to know it's mild and it's Coronary Artistry Disease a(Branch Vessel Disease) and need to follow medication continuously untill his instructions to reduce medications.

I disturbed so many times regarding my health issues very frankly discussing and  sharing with Dr. Praveen sir ,always with smile and polite he will answer all my questions and doubts very patiently .He is friendly and understand patience pulse and accordingly will suggest medications as well any test too...A BIG Thanks to my Dr.Praveen sir also I can strongly refer and suggest Dr.Praveen sir in my network and near and dear circle.. :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dr Praveen with 20-25% heart function; it had been months since I had a good night's sleep. The first thing Dr told me was that I would thank him for being able to sleep well. He started treatment immediately and brought my heart function to normal without hospitalization. Like he promised I have been sleeping well ever since! Thank you Dr. Praveen - I feel like my old self now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Praveen is an exceptional medical professional and a true life-saver. Three years ago, he saved my mother's life during a critical medical emergency In Vikram, and just recently, he came to the rescue again when my brother Parthiban had a heart attack in the middle of the night on July 11, 2023. Dr. Praveen is not just a doctor; he is a living God on earth who listened to our prayers and delivered solutions beyond our expectations.
Dr. Praveen's dedication to his patients is unparalleled. Despite his busy schedule, he always finds time to follow up on their health. His genuine concern and attentiveness demonstrate his unwavering commitment to providing the best possible care. His calm and composed demeanor during critical moments is remarkable and inspiring.
Beyond his medical prowess, Dr. Praveen possesses an incredible gift for connecting with his patients and their families. He goes beyond treating physical ailments; he recognizes the emotional and mental impact of illness and provides much-needed comfort and support. His compassion and empathy make him not just a remarkable doctor but also an extraordinary human being.
I am forever grateful to Dr. Praveen for the miracles he has worked in our lives. He is a beacon of hope and healing in the medical field. If you find yourself in need of a medical savior, look no further. Dr. Praveen is the epitome of excellence, compassion, and expertise.
Thank you, Dr. Praveen, for being our guardian angel and saving lives. Your dedication and exceptional care have made an indelible impact on our family.
reply_text: Thank You Umashankar for your kind words. I am very glad that your brother is doing well. We are nothing more than Clinicians treating patients and it's the Almighty above who cures us all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Praveen is very approachable and friendly. His advice and course of treatment is pragmatic and takes into account the patient‚Äôs circumstances and needs. We have developed a sense of comfort with him and go by his advice without ever having felt the need to get a second opinion. His expertise coupled with the manner in which he deals with the patient has led to these comfort levels. We would highly recommend him as a go-to cardiologist  and are truly appreciative of the care extended by him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wpuld like to start by saying -He is an experienced Doctor, **** ******* ********* *** the way he explain a patients condition and the consequences have been apt. I have been consulting him for my father for past 12+ years and we follow where ever or which ever hospital he goes to. He just remembers the patients history and was just a call away or text away during emergencies. Today my father (Lt. Mr Janardhana Raju) is no more, but his guidance, treatments was just about what my father needed. I have sincerely and religiously followed his Instructions, and must say- his treatment along with my father's will power gave him 19years of extension  of life  after his 1st  cardiac arrest and he survived with 40% since then. I cant thank you Dr Praveen enough for all the support and intimation towards the end, and predictions were just right for him. Thank you again.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hello. We visited Dr Praveen for my husband's Over all heart check up . And one of the things we really loved about this doctor is that Doctor was very keen in noting down all the history of the person. And also we had done our Ecg and Echo. And we got the best results and Also doctor changed the treatment for Hypertension. He is one of the best cardiologist available in Bangalore. Very very professional doctor. We both were very Happy about the service we received. And even now Whenever we need online consultation he is ready to do it. What more can we expect from a doctor. Highly recommend Dr Praveen who ever is in need..
reply_text: Thank You Serah. Hope you all are doing well. Difficult Times for all of us. Hope we all sail through.Take Care. Regards

review:
This is my 3rd consultation with Dr Praveen and i am very happy with his diagnosis and treatment. He gives you a patient hearing and explain things very well and very practical.

Dr. Praveen's approach is very practical and you will get a lot of confidence just speaking to him. My Experience has been that he will put you on to any pill only if required  and Infact i was saved from consuming a BP pill which was prescribed by another doctor but Praveen has actually suggested to be controlling that through diet and exercises which is actually working. Thank you Doctor Praveen
Dr.Av Praveen Kumar was patient enough to listen to my concerns and was very clear and concise in explaning the issue and how to go about the follow ups.
